channel.title: Client is stuck at connecting to server 1%
channel.description: This happens on every source + client i use, above 500, i tried a few 317's and they say error connecting to server, try restarting the client, i've tried on localhost, on my no-ip, tried a webclient and idk what to do :( Please help...
